transport.question: I go 'beep beep!' and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Mommy and Daddy drive me.
🎨 I can be lots of different colors.
🛣️ I have wheels and drive on roads.

transport.question: I float on the water. I might have a sail. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can go in the ocean.
🦆 Ducks like to swim near me.
⛵ I move on water and some have a big white cloth.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can take lots of people far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on metal rails.
📢 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🚝 People ride me to different cities.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to different countries. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
💺 You sit inside me.
✈️ I have wings but I am not a bird.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 Boys and girls like to ride me.
🔔 I sometimes have a bell to ring.
🚴 You use your feet to move me forward.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick up children.
🚌 I am long and carry many people.
🏫 I take kids to and from school every day.

transport.question: I carry lots of things on the road, like toys and food. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I have a big box on the back.
🚛 I am bigger than a car.
🛣️ You often see me on the highway.

transport.question: I am very fast and used to put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud siren sound.
👨‍🚒 Firefighters ride me.
🔥 I help put out fires so things don't burn.

transport.question: I fly high in space and explore other planets. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I need a lot of power to lift off.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🌌 I go where there are stars and planets.

transport.question: I can go on land and in water, and carry lots of people on a long journey. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I am bigger than a boat
⚓️ I have many rooms and cabins
🏖️ People travel on me to sunny vacation spots.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to chase string.
🐈 I have soft fur.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I have orange feet.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🪶 I have feathers.

animal.question: I say 'Woof' and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🚶‍♀️ I go on walks with my owner.
🎾 I love to play fetch!

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 My favorite food is orange.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🌱 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I moo and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I live on a farm.
🌱 I eat grass.
🥛 You drink my milk!

animal.question: I am big and grey and have a trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I have big ears.
🌍 I live in Africa or Asia.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me hide.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🐎 I look like a horse.

animal.question: I roar and have a big mane. I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a strong leader.
🦁 I live in Africa.
🥩 I like to eat meat.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I peel my food before I eat it.
🙊 I can make lots of noises.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a shell. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat leafy greens.
🐢 I can hide in my shell.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.
